title: What cleans leather other than saddle soap? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ve been using Dove facial bars forever to clean leather. Dove is milder than most soaps, including saddlesoaps, and it will clean leather without stripping too much of the oils and waxes out. Always use a good quality leather conditioner after cleaning, it will do more than anything else to keep leather supple and lasting as long as possible.

Leather is a very specialized material and should be cleaned with products made for this purpose. On some coated leathers you may be able to use a mild soap and water solution if you don’t soak the leather, but leather products are still the best bet.
